# UIWritingToolsCoordinator.TextReplacementReason.interactive

**Case**

An option to animate the replacement of text in your view.

## Declaration

```swift
case interactive
```

## Discussion

When Writing Tools requests an interactive change in your delegate’s `UIWritingToolsCoordinator/Delegate/writingToolsCoordinator(_:replaceRange:inContext:proposedText:reason:animationParameters:completion:)` method, it passes a valid set of animation parameters to that method. Update your view’s text storage and use the provided [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWritingToolsCoordinator/AnimationParameters] type to create any view-specific animations you need to support the animated replacement of the text.

## Getting the reasons

- **UIWritingToolsCoordinator.TextReplacementReason.noninteractive**: An option to replace the text in your view without animating the change.
